articles.title: OnePlus 9 to launch on March 23: Expected specifications, free gift and what you can expect - Gadgets Now
articles.description: OnePlus 9 series is set to launch on March 23, it's official. The smartphone brand has announced the launch date of its first flagship phones of 2021. The OnePlus 9 series smartphones will be formally announced at 10AM EDT (7.30 pm IST) on March 23. The compa…
